feed.title: GitHub Elixir Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Elixir in GitHub

entry.title: elixir-lsp/elixir-ls
entry.summary: A frontend-independent IDE "smartness" server for Elixir. Implements the "Language Server Protocol" standard and provides debugger support via the "Debug Adapter Protocol"

entry.title: chaskiq/ex-marcel
entry.summary: Find the mime type of files, examining file, filename and declared type

entry.title: rrrene/credo
entry.summary: A static code analysis tool for the Elixir language with a focus on code consistency and teaching.
